selected_skills.name: identify_pattern_in_sequence
selected_skills.purpose: To analyze the sequence of diagrams and identify the underlying pattern.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Pass the sequence of images to identify the pattern.

selected_skills.name: predict_next_object
selected_skills.purpose: To predict the next object in the sequence based on the identified pattern.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the identified pattern and sequence images to predict the next object.

selected_skills.name: map_prediction_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the predicted next object to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Pass the predicted next object and the list of options to get the correct option label.
